collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (5 total Queries, 4 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `invoices`.*, `client`.`client` as `clientName`, `currency`.`Currency`, `paymentmethods`.`Method` as `PaymentMethod`, (SELECT SUM(Sum) FROM invoicedetail WHERE invoicedetail.idReceipts = invoices.idReceipts) as Fee FROM `invoices` JOIN `client` ON `client`.`idClient` = `invoices`.`idClient` JOIN `currency` ON `currency`.`id` = `invoices`.`idCurrency` JOIN `paymentmethods` ON `paymentmethods`.`idPaymentMethods` = `invoices`.`paymentMethod` WHERE `invoices`.`idBusiness` = '39' AND `invoices`.`paymentMethod` = '1' LIMIT 20

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.
queries.sql: SELECT `invoices`.*, `client`.`client` as `clientName`, `currency`.`Currency`, `paymentmethods`.`Method` as `PaymentMethod`, (SELECT SUM(Sum) FROM invoicedetail WHERE invoicedetail.idReceipts = invoices.idReceipts) as Fee FROM `invoices` JOIN `client` ON `client`.`idClient` = `invoices`.`idClient` JOIN `currency` ON `currency`.`id` = `invoices`.`idCurrency` JOIN `paymentmethods` ON `paymentmethods`.`idPaymentMethods` = `invoices`.`paymentMethod` WHERE `invoices`.`idBusiness` = '39' AND `invoices`.`paymentMethod` = '1' LIMIT 20
